resources.string:
To view Intents, attach this device to your development machine. Run
 
 $ adb logcat -s BluetoothIntentLogger
 
 to see messages from this app. Or,
 
 $ adb logcat | grep /Bluetooth
 
 will show this app's messages and many other Bluetooth messages from the system.
 
 Extra field names are extracted from their corresponding classes using reflection. If you see a name that isn't found in the Android documentation, it might be a custom field added by the device manufacturer. Verify that an action or extra shown by this application appears in the official documentation before relying on it!
